name: Inevitable Aspiration - TasJam Game
description:
Game made in three days for the TasJam in September 2022

Escape the maze before you get killed or run out of air.

Controls:

Use mouse to look around, left click to shoot.

W and S to move forwards and backwards.

Oxygen tanks restore air. Air last for 2 minutes.

Recollect shot harpoons for ammo.

Sounds used:

MeijstroAudio, Dark Ambience 001

https://freesound.org/people/MeijstroAudio/sounds/371699/
